Hang head in shame

For being so slack, I've been pretty dead tired with work lately. Gill
is coming over to visit me here at the end of next month and I've been
told I have a lot of work to do before I am allowed to go out and play
:)

While she is here (I know she doesn't read this so I can refer to her
in the third person) we are going to be taking a little trip over to
california to visit my dad and my sisters. We have one week here on the
east coast, probably going to be staying in NY for a while and showing
her around my place here in Jersey.

Then after a week we are both jumping on (seperate) planes and meeting
up in San Fran, where we shall hire a car and drive up to Chico. We
have one week there before we fly our seperate ways.

Speaking of New York it is my birthday this weekend and I think I'll
head into NY with my flatmate Matt and hit the town for a bit of money
draining birthday goodness.

I've been meaning to get some more photos up but my camera has
developed a problem with the data cable :( I'm in the process of buying
a card reader so I'll have some photos up in the near future, til then
have a great one y'all.

Jamie
